item.title: Apple and Google instructed by House committee to prepare to dump TikTok next month
item.description: House members are telling Apple and Google to be prepared to comply with a law that could result in TikTok facing an effective ban in the U.S.

item.title: Tech companies most threatened by Trump are donating to his inauguration fund
item.description: Amazon, Meta, and OpenAI CEO Sam Altman have all announced $1 million donations to Trump's inauguration fund.

item.title: OpenAI emails show Elon Musk wanted for-profit structure in 2017
item.description: OpenAI on Friday posted screenshots showing that Elon Musk, one of its co-founders, pushed for the company to have a for-profit structure as far back ...

item.title: Broadcom stock closes up 24%, pushing company past $1 trillion market cap for the first time
item.description: Shares of Broadcom popped more than 24% Friday, pushing the company's market cap beyond $1 trillion for the first time.

item.title: Former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi hospitalized after injury in Luxembourg
item.description: Former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi was hospitalized after sustaining an injury while traveling with a congressional delegation in Luxembourg.
